abilityEffect.en: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Jigglypuff from your hand onto Igglybuff (this counts as evolving Igglybuff), and remove all damage counters from Igglybuff.

effect.en: Search your deck for a Basic Pok√©mon and a basic Energy card, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
